title: Battle
description: Battle against a trainer with 6 Pokémon, each of whose strength matches that of your strongest Pokémon.

title: Tent
description: Choose 3 mystery Pokémon among 6 to battle against the other 3. Your decision can change the tide of the battle!

title: Tower
description: Battle against some very strong trainers back to back. Earn bigger rewards as you progress. How far can you keep going?
